subNode:value.scalar:string: Display a page featuring the customer's favorite products.

favorite_product` ( `id_favorite_product` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_product` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_customer` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `id_shop` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `date_add` datetime NOT NULL, `date_upd` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_favorite_product`)) ENGINE=
